title: You need to reprogram your leaver buster code guys
body:
First, I did AFK once, beacuse my finacee was waiting for me, it was urgent, and I didn't do that again.
The game said I'm a leaver for forth or fifth time beause of my network.
I was on a vacation, I used my 3G for playing. sometimes randomly I freezed for couple of seconds, and what ever I do nothing changed. my 3G don't do that all the time but occasionally for some reasons I don't know.
In my home, my internet speed is at max 112 KB/s, if anyone think to stream even for a second, you can imagine what could happen then.

I'm not a leaver or an AFK player.
I love this game and play it a lot.
you need to check that because it seems that lots of people have problems with that.

Thanks

replies.body: I know your intention is not to leave, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat them all equally for everyone.  Leaving still causes others a bad experience, so your lower priority queue can continue to escalate until you show consistency of not leaving games.  If this is an issue for the time being, you'll want to stick to custom games and tune up your network stability.  I don't recommend trying to play League on 3G or a data plan, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help with general tune ups.

I understand that casuses bad experience for others, but that's not fair :/
It causes bad experience for me
sometimes that happens at the mid of the game
sometimes it happens just after the starting of the game
that's something unpredictable -_-
There's different between intentional AFK and bad connection
There's also some new thing happened more than once
sometimes the game just need to be reconnected before the game loading screen, whatever how many tries I made (the connection is good at this point), I can't return back, sometimes ping is 0 and sometimes the ping is normal and after like 60% it disconnects again, that happens like 3 times till now. And of course it treated as AFK
That makes my experience is so so bad like others, maybe even worst.
